scripts.metadata:relay: ./typegen.sh relay https://$RELAY_RPC && bun run metadata.ts relay $RELAY_RPC
scripts.metadata:people: ./typegen.sh people https://$PEOPLE_RPC && bun run metadata.ts people $PEOPLE_RPC
scripts.metadata:bulletin: ./typegen.sh bulletin https://$BULLETIN_RPC && bun run metadata.ts bulletin $BULLETIN_RPC
